trans-unit.source: Controls the schema generated by the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> when a class instance is serialized as SOAP encoded XML.
trans-unit.target: 控制由生成的架构<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>当类实例序列化为 SOAP 编码 XML。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: The SoapTypeAttribute class belongs to a family of attributes that controls how the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> serializes or deserializes an object as encoded SOAP XML.
trans-unit.target: SoapTypeAttribute 类属于一系列属性，用于控制如何<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>序列化或反序列化对象作为编码的 SOAP XML。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: The resulting XML conforms to section 5 of the World Wide Web Consortium (www.w3.org) document, "Simple Object Access Protocol (SOAP) 1.1".
trans-unit.target: 结果 XML 符合万维网联合会 (www.w3.org) 文档，"简单对象访问协议 (SOAP) 1.1"的第 5 节。

trans-unit.source: For a complete list of similar attributes, see [Attributes That Control Encoded SOAP Serialization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 类似的属性的完整列表，请参阅[属性，控制编码 SOAP 序列化](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To serialize an object as an encoded SOAP message, construct the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> using an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> created with the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter.ImportTypeMapping%2A> method of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter> class.
trans-unit.target: 要序列化作为编码 SOAP 消息的对象，构造<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>使用<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping>创建使用<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter.ImportTypeMapping%2A>方法的<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter>类。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter.ImportTypeMapping%2A> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: The SoapTypeAttribute can only be applied to class declarations.
trans-unit.target: SoapTypeAttribute 可以仅应用于类声明中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute.IncludeInSchema%2A> property determines whether the resulting XML element type is included in the XML Schema document (.xsd) for the generated XML stream.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute.IncludeInSchema%2A>属性确定是否生成 XML 流的 XML 架构文档 (.xsd) 中包含生成的 XML 元素类型。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute.IncludeInSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: To see the schema, compile the class into a DLL file.
trans-unit.target: 若要查看架构，请将该类编译为 DLL 文件中。

trans-unit.source: Pass the resulting file as an argument to the [XML Schema Definition Tool (Xsd.exe)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 将生成的文件的自变量作为传递[XML 架构定义工具 (Xsd.exe)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The tool generates the XML Schema for the XML stream generated when the class is serialized by an instance of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> class.
trans-unit.target: 该工具将生成 XML 流类序列化的<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>类</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>实例时生成 XML 架构

trans-unit.source: Setting a different namespace causes Xsd.exe to write a different schema (.xsd) file for the XML stream generated when the class is serialized.
trans-unit.target: 设置不同的命名空间将导致 Xsd.exe 要写入序列化类时生成的 XML 流的不同架构 (.xsd) 文件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Create a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute> when overriding the serialization of a type.
trans-unit.target: 创建<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute>时重写一种类型的序列化。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Assign the object to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapType%2A> property of a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> and add the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> to a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>.
trans-unit.target: 将对象分配给<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapType%2A>属性<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>并将添加<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>到<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapType%2A>

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> class overview for more details about overriding SOAP serialization.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>类概述有关重写 SOAP 序列化的详细信息。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute"></xref> class and specifies the name of the XML type.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute"></xref>类，并指定 XML 类型的名称。

trans-unit.source: Create a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute> when overriding the serialization of a type.
trans-unit.target: 创建<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute>时重写一种类型的序列化。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Assign the object to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapType%2A> property of a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> and add the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> to a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>.
trans-unit.target: 将对象分配给<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapType%2A>属性<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>并将添加<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>到<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapType%2A>

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> class overview for more details about overriding SOAP serialization.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>类概述有关重写 SOAP 序列化的详细信息。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>

trans-unit.source: The name of the XML type that the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> generates when it serializes the class instance (and recognizes when it deserializes the class instance).
trans-unit.target: XML 名称键入<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>时它序列化的类实例 （并识别它进行反序列化的类实例时），将生成。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute"></xref> class and specifies the name and XML namespace of the type.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute"></xref>类，并指定名称和类型的 XML 命名空间。

trans-unit.source: Create a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute> when overriding the serialization of a type.
trans-unit.target: 创建<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute>时重写一种类型的序列化。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Assign the object to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapType%2A> property of a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> and add the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> to a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>.
trans-unit.target: 将对象分配给<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapType%2A>属性<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>并将添加<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>到<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapType%2A>

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> class overview for more details on overriding SOAP serialization.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>重写 SOAP 序列化的更多详细信息的类概述。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>

trans-unit.source: If you set a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute.Namespace%2A> value for more than one type (that is, if you apply the attribute to more than one class with a different <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute.Namespace%2A> value for each one), the [XML Schema Definition Tool (Xsd.exe)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) generates a separate schema file (.xsd) for each type.
trans-unit.target: 如果你设置<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute.Namespace%2A>多个类型的值 (即，如果将特性应用于多个替换为其他类<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute.Namespace%2A>为每个值)，则[XML 架构定义工具 (Xsd.exe)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)生成每种类型的单独的架构文件 (.xsd)。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute.Namespace%2A> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute.Namespace%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is because setting a different namespace for each type renders each type distinct from the others, which makes it necessary for each type to be written out as an independent entity.
trans-unit.target: 这是因为将设置不同的命名空间为每种类型会呈现每个类型不同于其他，这样，就需要对要写一个独立的实体为每个类型。

trans-unit.source: The name of the XML type that the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> generates when it serializes the class instance (and recognizes when it deserializes the class instance).
trans-unit.target: XML 名称键入<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>时它序列化的类实例 （并识别它进行反序列化的类实例时），将生成。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: The XML namespace of the type.
trans-unit.target: 类型的 XML 命名空间。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to include the type in SOAP-encoded XML Schema documents.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否要包含在 SOAP 编码的 XML 架构文档中的类型。

trans-unit.source: Apply the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute> to a class declaration to specify whether to include the type in the XML schema document.
trans-unit.target: 应用<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute>到类声明，以指定是否要包含在 XML 架构文档中的类型。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute>

trans-unit.source: To see the results of setting the properties of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute> class, compile your application as an executable or DLL, and pass the resulting file to the [XML Schema Definition Tool (Xsd.exe)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 若要查看的属性设置结果<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute>类，编译应用程序作为可执行文件或 DLL，并将传递到生成的文件[XML 架构定义工具 (Xsd.exe)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The tool writes the schema, including the type definition of the XML stream generated when the class is serialized.
trans-unit.target: 该工具将架构，包括类序列化时生成的 XML 流的类型定义。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to include the type in SOAP-encoded XML Schema documents; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>要包含在 SOAP 编码的 XML 架构文档; 中的类型否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the namespace of the XML type.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 XML 类型的命名空间。

trans-unit.source: If you set a Namespace value for more than one type (that is, if you apply the attribute to more than one class with a different Namespace value for each one), the [XML Schema Definition Tool (Xsd.exe)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) generates a separate schema file (.xsd) for each type.
trans-unit.target: 如果多个类型的 Namespace 值设置 （即，如果将特性应用到多个具有不同的 Namespace 值为每个类），则[XML 架构定义工具 (Xsd.exe)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)生成每种类型的单独的架构文件 (.xsd)。

trans-unit.source: This is because setting a different namespace for each type renders each type distinct from the others, which makes it necessary for each type to be written out as an independent entity.
trans-unit.target: 这是因为将设置不同的命名空间为每种类型会呈现每个类型不同于其他，这样，就需要对要写一个独立的实体为每个类型。

trans-unit.source: The namespace of the XML type.
trans-unit.target: XML 类型的命名空间。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the XML type.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 XML 类型的名称。

trans-unit.source: Apply the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute> to a class to specify the XML type's namespace, the XML type name, and whether to include the type in the XML Schema document.
trans-unit.target: 应用<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute>于类，以指定的 XML 类型的命名空间、 XML 类型名称，以及是否要包含在 XML 架构文档中的类型。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute>

trans-unit.source: To see the results of setting the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute> object's properties, compile your application as an executable or DLL, and pass the resulting file to the [XML Schema Definition Tool (Xsd.exe)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 若要查看的结果设置<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute>对象的属性，编译应用程序作为可执行文件或 DLL，并将传递到生成的文件[XML 架构定义工具 (Xsd.exe)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The tool writes the schema, including the type definition.
trans-unit.target: 该工具将架构，包括类型定义。

trans-unit.source: The name of the XML type.
trans-unit.target: XML 类型的名称。

trans-unit.source: The default is the class name.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为类名。
